typedef imod::CSingleModelObserverBase iview::CShapeBase::BaseClass

Definition at line 21 of file CShapeBase.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iview::CShapeBase::ShapeTransformMode

Describe how shape tranformation is interpreted.

Enumerator
STM_VIEW 

Shape transformation will be ignored, view transformation will be used.

STM_SHAPE 

View transformation will be ignored, shape transformation will be used.

STM_COMBINE 

Both transformation will be used, shape transformation will be used as local transformation.

virtual i2d::CRect iview::CShapeBase::CalcBoundingBox ( ) const
protectedpure virtual

Calculate bounding box.

You have to implement this method in your shapes implementations.

Implemented in iview::CTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CParallelogramShape, iview::CPolygonShape, iview::CAffineTransformation2dShape, iview::CLabelShape, iview::CPolylineShape, iview::CAnnulusShape, iview::CTubePolylineShape, iview::CRectangleShape, iview::CLineShape, iview::CArrowShape, iview::CNoneCalibrationShape, iview::CCircleShape, iview::CPinShape, iview::CImageShape, iview::CCenterPinShape, iview::CPerspectiveCalibrationBoundsShape, iview::CPolypointShape, iview::CSplineShape, and iview::COrientedCircleShape.

void iview::CShapeBase::DisconnectDisplay ( )
protected
virtual i2d::CRect iview::CShapeBase::GetBoundingBox ( ) const
virtual

Return bounding box in client window coordinates.

You can store this bounding box for optimization, because about every change of transformation you will be informed by calling OnDisplayChange(int) method.

Implements iview::IShape.

Get display changes mask.

virtual void iview::CShapeBase::InvalidateBoundingBox ( )
protectedvirtual

Invalidate bounding box.

You can overload this method to provide validation of your internal attributes, because this method is called from Invalidate(int) and OnDisplayChange(int) methods. Please don't forget base method call in your implementations.

Reimplemented in iview::CParallelogramShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CArrowShape, iview::CLineShape, and iview::CRectangleShape.

virtual ITouchable::TouchState iview::CShapeBase::IsTouched ( istd::CIndex2d  position) const
virtual

Check, if any shape is touched.

When shape is touched, it return also pointer to this shape.

Returns
touch state for the shape, or iview::IInteractiveShape::TS_NONE, when nothing found.

Implements iview::ITouchable.

virtual bool iview::CShapeBase::OnAttached ( imod::IModel *  modelPtr)
virtual

This call back function will be called, if an observable object is about to be attached.

This function returns a true, if observable object is accepted by the implementation logic of the observer, otherwise the function returns a false.

Reimplemented from imod::CSingleModelObserverBase.

Reimplemented in iview::CParallelogramShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CLabelShape, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::CPolygonShape, iview::CAffineTransformation2dShape, iview::CAnnulusShape, iqtgui::TGuiObserverWrap< CViewProviderGuiComp, iview::CImageShape >, iview::CCircleShape, iview::CArrowShape, iview::CImageShape, iview::CLineShape, iview::CRectangleShape, iview::CAnnulusSegmentShape, iview::CPolylineShape, iview::CPinShape, iview::CPolypointShape, iview::COrientedCircleShape, and iview::CSplineShape.

virtual bool iview::CShapeBase::OnDisplayChange ( int  flags)
virtual

It informs about changes in display.

It is called e.g. after view transformation change.

Returns
true, if this change follow shape changes.
